Parameters: CharSequence: the constraint used to filter the data
Filter.FilterResults: the results of the filtering operation
publishResults(java.lang.CharSequence,an.Description: Invoked in the UI thread to publish the filtering results in the user interface. Subclasses must implement this method to display the results computed in @B_android#widget#Filter#performFiltering_E@.
publishResults(java.lang.CharSequence,an.FullName: protected abstract void publishResults (CharSequence constraint, Filter.FilterResults results)

Parameters: CharSequence: the constraint used to filter the data
filter(java.lang.CharSequence).Description: Starts an asynchronous filtering operation. Calling this method cancels all previous non-executed filtering requests and posts a new filtering request that will be executed later.

Returns: the results of the filtering operation
Parameters: CharSequence: the constraint used to filter the data
performFiltering(java.lang.CharSequence).Description: Invoked in a worker thread to filter the data according to the constraint. Subclasses must implement this method to perform the filtering operation. Results computed by the filtering operation must be returned as a @B_android#widget#Filter#FilterResults_E@ that will then be published in the UI thread through @B_android#widget#Filter#publishResults_E@.

Parameters: CharSequence: the constraint used to filter the data
Filter.FilterListener: a listener notified upon completion of the operation
filter(java.lang.CharSequence,android.wi.Description: Starts an asynchronous filtering operation. Calling this method cancels all previous non-executed filtering requests and posts a new filtering request that will be executed later. Upon completion, the listener is notified.
filter(java.lang.CharSequence,android.wi.FullName: public final void filter (CharSequence constraint, Filter.FilterListener listener)

Parameters: Object: the value to convert to a CharSequence
convertResultToString(java.lang.Object).Description: Converts a value from the filtered set into a CharSequence. Subclasses should override this method to convert their results. The default implementation returns an empty String for null values or the default String representation of the value.

ClassDesc: A filter constrains data with a filtering pattern. Filters are usually created by @B_android#widget#Filterable_E@ classes. Filtering operations performed by calling @B_android#widget#Filter#filter_E@ or @B_android#widget#Filter#filter_E@ are performed asynchronously. When these methods are called, a filtering request is posted in a request queue and processed later. Any call to one of these methods will cancel any previous non-executed filtering request.
